column4: Installed Ubu 1st time today. Funny problems, Gnome crashed, but I think I will be patient.
Real irk: Install shows all drives for partitioning etc. When finally in Gnome, shows only one HDD - why no others?
/sbin/fdisk -l will show other partitions/disks to you.  If you want to use them you need to mount them
- cool. I think that Ubu should do that auto - esp after install. no?
